section.title: Configuring the Multiplexer
section.para: Configuring the Multiplexer requires configuration changes to the diameter-config.xml file. The diameter-config.xml file is a standard JDiameter configuration file, and forms the base configuration for all MUX listener applications.
By default, diameter-config.xml is located in the \default\deploy\mobicents-diameter-mux-[version_number].sar\config\ directory.
It is not yet possible to change configuration in runtime, however this feature is planned for subsequent versions of the Multiplexer.
